entry.title: VANGELO Men Dress Shoe VALLO-1 Oxford Formal Tuxedo for Prom and Wedding Brown Matte - Wide Width Available - Ortholite Insole
entry.s:type: Men Dress Shoe Oxford Formal Tuxedo for Prom & Wedding
entry.summary:
Vendor: VANGELO
Type: Men Dress Shoe Oxford Formal Tuxedo for Prom & Wedding
Price: 45.00 - 55.00 (33 variants)

  • Enjoy Relaxed Sophistication with this VANGELO Dress Shoe, A True Combination of Timeless Style, Fashion and Classic. This Plain Round Toe Lace Up Dress Shoe is the Shoe Every Man Longs For.
  • This Vallo Fiber Breathable Vegan Leather Oxford Featuring Plain Round Toe and Blind Eyelet Lacing.
  • Fully Cushioned Professional Inbuilt Ortholite Insole for Wicking Away Moisture, Odour and Fungus, and Superior Padded Cushy Comfort and Shock Absorption.
  • Breathable Linings, and Light Weight EVA sole with Extended Durability. Heel Measures Approximately 1".
  • Full Size Range from 6.5 to 18 with Medium and Wide Width. Perfectly for Prom, Wedding, Formal, or any Business Occasions.
